originalText.text: As a vendor in the Event Décor space to have a successful execution of an event, you must have a partner (client) who is fully immersed in the project. The Eventique team offers a standard that guarantees a flawless program.  The vision articulated is clear, and the support is constant. It is clear to Eventique that one cannot succeed without the other.  This is a truly professional organization who deserves every bit of trust that they are given by their clients. My recommendation is without hesitation as I offer my full endorsement.

originalText.text: My company has collaborated with Eventique on a variety of high-profile productions in the Los Angeles area. The Eventique team is always a pleasure to work with. Their passion for what they do, creativity, and innovative spirit always shine through. They are one of the most dedicated teams I've ever worked with, always going the extra mile to deliver excellence. It's always great people, great times, and great work with Eventique.

originalText.text:
I have had the pleasure of working with Eventique and their terrific staff at fundraising event at the JCC on Amsterdam Ave.

From start to finish their staff were professsional, curious and very prompt with their email reply’s. The day of the event, Eventique’s members greeted me and treated myself and my team with the upmost sense of professionalism there is. We  collaborated on the event together and it was a huge success!

I highly recommend this company and will be using them in the future on a personal and professional level. Thank you guys again for making work seem so much fun!

originalText.text: Eventique facilitated our Holiday Appreciation event at Madam Tussaud's Times Square on Tuesday December 10th. While we anticipated about 350 attendees, we had nearly a thousand guests "surprise" us. Under the leadership of our account manager, Alexia Deleers, this company reacted accordingly and perfectly accommodated this crowd. Throughout the planning of this important client event, we found Alexia and her team to be extremity knowledgeable and organized. They literally handled everything from soup to nuts allowing myself and my team to focus on the attendees. Our clients are our life blood, and Alexia understood that. She left nothing unattended. The venue, the caterer and the decorator all complimented Eventique for their organized approach to this important event. It was one of the few events we've planned, and we plan several every year that went as smoothly as this one, even though we doubled the expected "workload"  on them. All I can say to close this post, is that Eventique is now our "go to" for events in the future. Thank you, Alexia!

originalText.text: There are not enough stars to rank Eventique. They are truly amazing at what they do and it is a pleasure working with them. I would highly recommend them to anyone looking a one of a kind event.
